articles.author: Matt Williams
articles.title: One of Neptune's Dark Spots Finally Seen From Earth - Universe Today
articles.description: Using the ESO's VLT, an international team of observers was able to study Neptune's Great Dark Spot with a ground-based telescope for the first time.
articles.content: There’s no getting around it: our Solar System’s gas giants all have big, conspicuous spots on their faces. These include Jupiter’s Great Red Spot, Saturn’s Great White Spot, Uranus’ Great Dark Spot,… [+4556 chars]
